response:
Young adult with multifocal CNS findings separated in space strongly suggests inflammatory demyelination; brainstem involvement and a cervical myelopathy fit MS/MOGAD/NMOSD. Infective rhombencephalitis and vascular lateral medullary infarct are urgent exclusions; structural cervicomedullary compression less likely but must be ruled out by MRI.

differential_diagnosis = ["Relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis", "MOG antibody-associated disease", "Neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder (AQP4-IgG positive)", "Listeria rhombencephalitis", "Brainstem ischaemic stroke (lateral medullary infarct)", "Cervical compressive myelopathy", "Chiari I malformation with cervicomedullary compression", "Neurosarcoidosis"]
